code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AuthLoginForm=_ref=>{let{onLogin}=_ref;const[userId,setUserId]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();const res=await fetch('/api/auth/login',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({userId,password})});if(res.ok){const user=await res.json();onLogin(user);}else{alert('Credenciales incorrectas');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"max-w-sm mx-auto mt-10 p-4 border rounded bg-white",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl mb-4",children:"Iniciar sesi\xF3n"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Usuario",value:userId,onChange:e=>setUserId(e.target.value),className:"w-full mb-2 p-2 border"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Contrase\xF1a",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),className:"w-full mb-4 p-2 border"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"bg-black text-white px-4 py-2 rounded",children:"Entrar"})]});};export{AuthLoginForm};
